menu_game_options_ball_speed_tooltip: Controls the initial speed of the ball.
menu_game_options_max_score_tooltip: Required score to win the game.
menu_game_options_tiebreaker_tooltip: In order to win, a player has to have at least 2 more points than their opponent.
menu_game_options_obstacle_tooltip: Adds a moving obstacle in the middle of the playing field.
menu_game_options_combo_enabled_tooltip: Combo points are gained whenever you hit the ball. When your combo gets high enough, you will score bonus points if you win the round.
menu_game_options_combo_disabled_tooltip: Enable combo points to edit this option.
menu_game_options_combo_points_tooltip: Minimum number of combo points required to earn one bonus point.
menu_game_options_combo_max_tooltip: Maximum number of bonus points you can earn.
menu_game_options_chaos_mode_tooltip: Every time the ball hits a player's paddle it gets faster. Good luck.
menu_customization_edit_controls_tooltip: To cancel editing, press the Escape key. To clear/revert to default, hold the edit button/option name.
menu_options_vfx_tooltip: Show glow effects, impact sparks etc.
menu_revert_tooltip: Hold to revert to default settings.
menu_effects_disabled_tooltip: Enable visual effects to change glow color.
